column4: would someone be kind enough to tell me how to enable using the mouse wheel (z axis) on the gnome desktop to switch virtual desktops? i'm an ex-kde user and i just can't find this tick-box anywhere in gnome!
install compiz manager, then you can add desktop effects via system> preferences.
wow that's an obscure spot for such a setting :\ thanks though :)
